todos.title: Clean the House
todos.description: Vacuum the floors, dust the furniture, and organize the living room.

todos.title: Buy Groceries
todos.description: Make a list and go to the grocery store to stock up on essentials and fresh produce.

todos.title: Exercise
todos.description: Go for a 30-minute jog or do a home workout to stay active and healthy.

todos.title: Read a Book
todos.description: Spend at least 20 minutes reading a book of your choice to unwind and gain knowledge.

todos.title: Prepare for Presentation
todos.description: Gather information, create slides, and rehearse for an upcoming presentation at work/school.
